title: Should England Fall: The Fighting Tomcats Book 4
description: Rommel has landed at Newcastle on the north coast of England. Russia and Germany have signed a cease fire. All of the Luftwaffe is free to support Rommel. The British forces are focused on the south coast of England. Can America supply the men and materials needed in time to defend England.? Can the British forces hold? Can Britain stand?With Rommel's tank divisions is a SS unit with one mission. Destroy Alconbury and Task Force Yankee.Commodore Samantha Hunt's Task Force Yankee has three operational F-14 Tomcats. But, she has a secret weapon. The tank killing A-10 Warthog is in theater.
author: M.L. Maki
